title.en: Master's Thesis - Innovation and Technology Management

structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Master thesis is completed as independent research under the supervision of the teacher of particular chair. The topic and the field of the thesis is agreed with the supervisor and discussed in master seminars. The thesis is compiled according to the rules of the University of Tartu.
description.et: Magistritöö valmib magistrandi iseseisva tööna konkreetse õppetooli õppejõu juhendamisel. Probleemistik kooskõlastatakse õppejõuga ja arutatakse läbi magistriseminaril. Magistriprojekt koostatakse vastavalt Tartu Ülikoolis kehtivatele nõuetele.

objectives.en: The aim of the subject is to demonstrate the knowledge, skills of research, development and authoring, and communication skills of the student. In the evaluation process of study results the attitudes and values of the student are evaluated.
objectives.et: Õppeaine läbimisega demonstreerib üliõpilane omandatud teadmisi, uurimis- arendus- ja loometöö oskusi ja kommunikatsioonivõimet. Mooduli õpitulemuste hindamise käigus kontrollitakse ka omandatud hoiakuid ja väärtushinnanguid.

learning_outcomes.en: poses research questions and chooses relevant theories and methods for research;
learning_outcomes.et: oskab püstitada uurimisküsimusi ning valida nende uurimiseks sobivaid teoretilisi käsitlusi ja metoodikaid;

learning_outcomes.en: creates logical and relevant structure of the thesis;
learning_outcomes.et: oskab tööd loogiliselt ja otstarbekalt struktureerida;

learning_outcomes.en: can search and use relevant sources;
learning_outcomes.et: oskab otsida ja kasutada sobivaid allikaid;

learning_outcomes.en: formulates own ideas, argues and reasons own viewpoints clearly and logically;
learning_outcomes.et: sõnastab oma mõtteid, argumenteerib ja põhjendab oma seisukohti arusaadavalt ning loogiliselt;

learning_outcomes.en: uses correct terms, data and facts, knows formal rules of master thesis;
learning_outcomes.et: kasutab korrektselt termineid, andmeid ja fakte ning tunneb magistritöö vormistusreegleid;

learning_outcomes.en: bases their conclusions on their own analysis and points out conclusions of previous discussion.
learning_outcomes.et: tugineb oma järeldustes analüüsile ning teeb kokkuvõtteid, mis on kooskõlas töö eelneva arutluskäiguga.

notes.et:
A Master's Thesis can be admitted to final defense:
- if the supervisor of the thesis agrees that the thesis is ready to defend
- if there is no plagiarism according to the rules of UT on academic fraud

grade_preconditions.et: The courses in the curriculum (except Master's thesis) should be completed. The Master's thesis course requirements and deadlines should be respected.

grade_evaluation.et: The final grade depends on the quality of the Master's thesis. It is decided by the thesis committee, who takes into account the opponents' and supervisors' opinions.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: All course material are shared in the Moodle page of the course.
